ai-thig2.7:1.1_0: I rejoice in the host of gods,
ai-thig2.7:1.4_0: on the fourteenth and the fifteenth days,
ai-thig2.7:2.1_0: and the eighth day of the fortnight,
ai-thig2.7:2.2_0: as well as on the fortnightly special displays.
ai-thig2.7:2.3_0: Today I eat just once a day,
ai-thig2.7:2.4_0: my head is shaven, I wear the outer robe.
ai-thig2.7:2.5_0: they won’t go to the heaven of the gods,
ai-thig2.7:2.6_0: for stress has been removed from my heart.
